newsitem.title: POLAND: WEDEL PLANS TO CREATE HOLDING GROUP.
newsitem.headline: WEDEL PLANS TO CREATE HOLDING GROUP.

text.p: Polish confectioner Wedel SA wants to transform itself into a holding group encompassing four main subsidiaries to improve efficiency, the company said on Thursday.

Wedel management said in a statement it would call an extraordinary shareholders meeting on July 23 to vote on its proposal to create four fully-owned subsidiaries specialised in producing chocolate, salty snacks, biscuits and sweets.

"Proposed changes would help improve Wedel's financial performance and bring long-term benefits for its shareholders by creating a structure which will allow the management to better take account of differences between various market segments," it said.
